system.requirements:
Tier 2: Common Lore (Imperial Creed) +10 or Forbidden Lore (Daemonology) 
Aptitudes: Offence, Willpower
system.effect: Once per round as a Half Action, character can speak litanies and invocations to disrupt daemons. Until the beginning of their next turn, Daemonis within Willpower Bonus x 2 metres suffer -10 to Willpower Tests.
